senses.sense_definition: The detention center located at the United States naval base in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, used for holding prisoners without trial.

examples.text: Human rights organizations have frequently called for the government to close <w>Gitmo</w>.
The legal status of the <w>Gitmo</w> detainees has been a subject of international debate.

senses.sense_definition: The United States naval base located at Guantanamo Bay on the island of Cuba.

examples.text: My grandfather was stationed at <w>Gitmo</w> during his service in the navy.
Supplies are shipped regularly to the troops living at <w>Gitmo</w>.
